  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_86903</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_86903</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Agitation du mélange du sable et d'eau</string>
            <string language="en">Stirring the mixture of sand and water</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rühren der Mischung des Sandes und des Wassers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Agitando a mistura da areia e da água</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mescolatura della miscela della sabbia e 
dell'acqua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανακάτωμα του μίγματος άμμου και ύδατος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Revolvimiento de la mezcla de la arena y del 
agua</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Ce diagramme illustre que le sable est transporté avec l'eau pendant que leur mélange dans le bécher est remué et quand le remuement est terminé, le sable s'installe au fond en tant que sédiment.</string>
            <string language="en">This diagram illustrates that the sand is carried along with water as their mixture in the beaker is stirred and when the stirring stops, the sand settles at the bottom as sediment.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">mélanges</string>
            <string language="en">mixtures</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">sable</string>
            <string language="en">sand</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">sédiments</string>
            <string language="en">sediments</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">arrangement</string>
            <string language="en">settling</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">remuant</string>
            <string language="en">stirring</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">l'eau</string>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm veranschaulicht, daß der Sand 
zusammen mit Wasser, während ihre Mischung im Becher gerührt wird 
und wenn die rührenden Anschläge, der Sand vereinbart an der 
Unterseite als Sediment getragen wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama ilustra que a areia está carregada 
junto com a água enquanto sua mistura na taça é agitada e quando os
batentes agitando, a areia se estabelece no fundo como o sedimento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema illustra che la sabbia è 
trasportata con acqua mentre la loro miscela nella coppa è mescolata 
e quando gli arresti di mescolatura, la sabbia si deposita alla parte 
inferiore come sedimento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα διευκρινίζει ότι η άμμος φέρεται 
μαζί με το ύδωρ καθώς το μίγμα τους στην κούπα ανακατώνεται και 
όταν εγκαθιστούν οι ανακατώνοντας στάσεις, η άμμος στο κατώτατο 
σημείο ως ίζημα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama ilustra que la arena está llevada 
junto con el agua como su mezcla en el cubilete se revuelve y cuando 
las paradas de revolvimiento, la arena coloca en el fondo como 
sedimento.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mischungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sand</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sedimente</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vereinbaren</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rühren</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasser</string>
          </keyword>
